text: The Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia shall exercise authority over the Corporation consistent with §§ 1-204.24a through 1- 204.24f.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 44-951.01.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 44-407.

DC CODE § 44-951.18

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Authority of the Chief Financial Officer.
